title: Christine Lagarde Biography for Kids
snippet: She was married to Wilfried Lagarde from 1982 to1992 and bore two kids Thomas and Pierre-Henri, and then divorced later married to Eachran Gilmour and divorced. Christine was appointed the first female to head the Ministry of Finance, Economy ...

title: Christine Lagarde - Wikipedia
snippet: In December 2016, a French court convicted her of negligence relating to her role in the Bernard Tapie arbitration, but did not impose a penalty. Lagarde resigned from the IMF following her nomination as president of the ECB. In 2019, 2020, 2022, 2023, 2024, and 2025, Forbes ranked her number ...

title: Christine Lagarde | Biography, IMF, ECB, & Facts | Britannica
snippet: 16, 2025 •History Table of Contents ... Christine Lagarde (born January 1, 1956, Paris, France) is a French lawyer and politician who was the first woman to serve as France’s finance minister (2007–11), as the managing director of the International Monetary Fund (IMF; 2011–19), and as president of the European Central Bank (2019– ).
